content: गांडि(डी)वः, --वं [गांडिरस्त्यस्य संज्ञायाम् व <ls>P. V. 2. 110</ls>] {@--1@} The bow of Arjuna, presented by Soma to Varuṇa by Varuṇa to Agni, and by Agni to Arjuna, when the latter assisted him in consuming the खांडववन; गांडीवं स्रंसते हस्तात् <ls>Bg. 1. 29.</ls> {@--2@} A bow in general.

गांडि(डी)वः, --वं [गांडिरस्त्यस्य संज्ञायाम् व <ls>P. V. 2. 110</ls>] {@--1@} The bow of Arjuna, presented by Soma to Varuṇa by Varuṇa to Agni, and by Agni to Arjuna, when the latter assisted him in consuming the खांडववन; गांडीवं स्रंसते हस्तात् <ls>Bg. 1. 29.</ls> {@--2@} A bow in general.
